caption.p: Mechanisms of MC in anti-inflammation. MC agents can inhibit TNF- α straightly or in the way of stimulating PPAR- γ and suppressing JNK, to lessen the expression of iNOS and COX-2, thus reducing NO and multiple inflammatory cytokines. MC agents can also inhibit NF- κB, which is concerned with TNF- α, to lower the production of various inflammatory cytokines. Besides, the expression of IL-1, IL-6, CCL-5, G1p2, and CCL-2 can be inhibited in the macrophages.
